name: PureFTPd-Manager
tagline: PureFTPd Manager is a simple Cocoa frontend to PureFTPd, "a free (BSD), secure, production-quality and standard-conformant FTP server based upon Troll-FTPd", for Mac OS X.
body:
### PureFTPd-Manager
PureFTPd Manager is a simple Cocoa frontend to PureFTPd, "a free (BSD), secure, production-quality and standard-conformant FTP server based upon Troll-FTPd", for Mac OS X.

```
$ git clone git://github.com/AppleLife/PureFTPd-Manager.git
$ cd PureFTPd-Manager
$ open .
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
